skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: descendants challenge
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Descendants Challenge is the official Disney Descendants music trivia game that tests your knowledge of the music, lyrics and characters from the hit Disney Channel franchise, Descendants! 

Can you name each song that Mal or Evie sings? Do you know every word to Audrey’s “Queen of Mean”? We’re gonna break this down. This trivia game will put your knowledge to the test to see who the biggest Disney Descendants fan is. Collect stars to compete with others on our daily and all-time leaderboards. It‘s going to be wickedly awesome.

The Descendants Challenge is hosted by Evie herself, Sofia Carson. May the fiercest win.
